newsitem.title: USA: Safeguard unit to offer rights July 1.
newsitem.headline: Safeguard unit to offer rights July 1.

text.p: Safeguard Scientifics Inc said Friday that it expects the registration statement filed by its ChromaVision Medical Systems Inc unit will become effective July 1.
The company said ChromaVision is offering rights to its shareholders to purchase 6.4 million shares of ChromaVision stock in a spin off from Safeguard.

Safeguard said that its shareholders will receive one transferrable right to buy one share of ChromaVision for every five shares of Safeguard. Each right wil allow the holder to purchase one share of Chroma Vision common at the anticipated price of $5.00.
